hyperspace_fools_coco_tek.author: Hyperspace Fool
hyperspace_fools_coco_tek.purpose: Make insufflation more tolerable using coconut cream
procedure: 1. Take dose of DMT, place in small shotglass
2. Mix with enough mildly hot water so 1 drop = 20mg spice (use more water if needed to dissolve)
3. Add touch of vinegar to convert freebase to acetate (not needed with salt spice)
4. Add few drops of COCONUT CREAM (not oil, not water) until solution is cloudy white
6. Drop into nostril while inhaling to spread over larger surface of nasal mucosa

notes.nasal_spray: Fine atomizing spray is nice but not necessary
notes.duration: Longer than vaped spice - attractive ROA

harmalas_addition.effect: Potentiates spice further - longer effect, less DMT required
harmalas_addition.warning: With enough harmalas, insufflated can last long time, more like Aya
harmalas_addition.combo: Using when already on oral harmalas is fantastic

flexibility_note.dosage_variance: Some need 15mg, others over 100mg for effects
flexibility_note.vinegar_note: If used vinegar, might want more cream
flexibility_note.reassurance: Can't really mess up - just dissolve spice fully, cream to taste
flexibility_note.drip_management: Lean head off mattress/couch to keep solution in nasal cavities
